nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.insights.components.browserTimings.receiveDuration`)AS 'Average Receiving Response Time', AVERAGE(`azure.insights.components.availabilityResults.availabilityPercentage`) AS 'Average Availability', SUM(`azure.insights.components.dependencies.failed`) AS 'Total Dependencies Failed' , SUM(`azure.insights.components.exceptions.browser`) AS 'Total Browser Exceptions' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.insights/components'

rawConfiguration.text:
## AZURE APPLICATION INSIGHTS
Application Insights is an application performance management service for web applications that enables you to do all the monitoring of your website performance in Azure. It’s designed to ensure you’re getting optimal performance and the best in class user experience from your website. It also has a powerful analytic tool that helps you diagnose issues and gain an understanding of how people are using your web application.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.insights.components.browserTimings.receiveDuration`) AS 'Average Receiving Response Time' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.insights/components' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE('azure.insights.components.availabilityResults.availabilityPercentage') AS 'Average Availability' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.insights/components' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT SUM(`azure.insights.components.dependencies.failed`) AS 'Total Dependencies Failed' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.insights/components' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT SUM(`azure.insights.components.exceptions.browser`) AS 'Total Browser Exceptions' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.insights/components' TIMESERIES AUTO
